comment.author: 59375758@N06
comment._content:
The mountain in the background is Mt Elgon - please refer to the photo below which was taken from the base of Sergoit Rock - a protuberance on the North Eastern part of the Uasin Gishu Plateau:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/59375758@N06/5549184018/]
and one closer taken just outside Kitale which shows the bluff at Endebess in the foreground
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/59375758@N06/5548657329/]
